testcase.purpose: Tests the user agent's ability to process files with no file extension.

step.expected: To pass, the user agent start file of the widget must be index.htm

testcase.purpose: Tests the user agent's ability to process files with a file extension other than .wgt.

step.expected: To pass, the user agent start file of the widget must be index.htm

testcase.purpose: Test the ability of the UA to verify a zip archive.

step.expected: To pass, the user agent must treat this as an invalid widget (archive is spanned).

testcase.purpose: Test the user agent's ability to get a widget over HTTP and respect the application/widget mimetype. The server from which this test is served from has been set up to label the 'test' resource as an 'application/widget'.

step.expected: To pass, a user agent must correctly process this resource as a widget because of the 'application/widget' mimetype (i.e., not only because of sniffing).

testcase.purpose: Test the user agent's ability to get a widget over HTTP and respect the 'application/widget' mimetype. The server from which this test is served from has been set up to label the 'test.html' resource as an 'application/widget'.

step.expected: To pass, a user agent must correctly process this resource as a widget because of the 'application/widget' mimetype (i.e., not only via sniffing).

testcase.purpose: Tests that an empty defaultlocale attribute is ignored (and does not cause the widget to be treated as invalid).

step.expected: To pass, the widget must simply run..

testcase.purpose: Tests that the user agent applies rule for getting a single attribute value to the defaultlocale attribute.

step.expected: To pass, the name of the widget must be the value PASS..

testcase.purpose: Test that the user agent matches obscure, yet valid, language tags.

step.expected: To pass, the widgets description must be the value PASS..

testcase.purpose: Tests that a language tag already part of the UA's locales list is ignored when it is repeated for defaultlocale attribute.

step.expected: To pass, the specified value should not be added twice to the locales list of the UA..

testcase.purpose: Tests that the default locale is added to the end of the user agent's locale list (and does not override the default language, which is assumed to be 'en').

step.expected: To pass, the name of the widget must be PASS..

testcase.purpose: Tests that the value of defaultlocale is also used to in folder-based localization.

step.expected: To pass, the index.html of the folder 'locales/esx-al/' should be loaded and say PASS..

testcase.purpose: Tests that the value of defaultlocale works in conjunction to xml:lang on the widget element.

step.expected: To pass, the name of the widget must be PASS..

testcase.purpose: Tests that the UA rejects configuration documents that don't have correct widget element at the root.

step.expected: To pass, the UA must treat this as an invalid widget (the root element is not widget)..

testcase.purpose: Tests that the UA rejects configuration documents that don't have correct widget element at the root.

step.expected: To pass, the UA must treat this as an invalid widget (the namespace is wrong)..

testcase.purpose: Tests that the UA rejects configuration documents that don't have correct widget element at the root.

step.expected: To pass, the UA must treat this as an invalid widget (the namespace is missing)..

testcase.purpose: Test that a user agent correctly processes a author element.

step.expected: To pass, the author name must be the string "PASS"..

testcase.purpose: Test that a user agent correctly applies the Rule for Getting Text Content with Normalized White Space.

step.expected: To pass, the widget author must be the string "P A S S" (i.e., white space collapsed to single space)..

testcase.purpose: Test that a user agent correctly applies the Rule for Getting Text Content with Normalized White Space.

step.expected: To pass, the author name must be the string "PASS" (i.e., all white space collapsed to single space, spaces at start/end trimmed)..

testcase.purpose: Test that a user agent correctly applies the rule for getting a single attribute value.

step.expected: To pass, the author email must be the string "PASS"..

testcase.purpose: Test that a user agent correctly applies the rule for getting a single attribute value and the Rule for Getting Text Content with Normalized White Space.

step.expected: To pass, the author name must be the string "PASS"..

testcase.purpose: Test that a user agent correctly applies the rule for getting a single attribute value and the Rule for Getting Text Content with Normalized White Space.

step.expected: To pass, the author name must be the string "PASS"..

testcase.purpose: Test the ability of the user agent to handle an empty author element.

step.expected: To pass, the author name must be an empty string..

testcase.purpose: Test the ability of the user agent to correctly process the author href attribute.

step.expected: To pass, the value of author href must be "PASS:PASS"..

testcase.purpose: Test the ability of the user agent to correctly process the author href attribute.

step.expected: To pass, the value of author href must be ignored..

testcase.purpose: Test that a user agent correctly processes a name element.

step.expected: To pass, the widget name must be the string "PASS"..

testcase.purpose: Test that a user agent correctly applies the Rule for Getting Text Content with Normalized White Space.

step.expected: To pass, the widget name must be the string "P A S S" (i.e., white space collapsed to single space)..

testcase.purpose: Test that a user agent correctly applies the Rule for Getting Text Content with Normalized White Space.

step.expected: To pass, the widget name must be the string "PASS" (i.e., all white space collapsed to single space, spaces at front/back trimmed)..

testcase.purpose: Test that a user agent correctly applies the rule for getting a single attribute value.

step.expected: To pass, the widget short name must be the string "PASS"..

testcase.purpose: Test that a user agent correctly applies the rule for getting a single attribute value and the Rule for Getting Text Content with Normalized White Space.

step.expected: To pass, the widget short name must be the string "PASS" and the widget name must be "PASS"..

testcase.purpose: Test that a user agent correctly applies the rule for getting a single attribute value and the Rule for Getting Text Content with Normalized White Space.

step.expected: To pass, the widget short name must be the string "PASS" and the widget name must be "PASS"..

testcase.purpose: Test that a user agent correctly processes the short attribute.

step.expected: To pass, the widget short name must be an empty string..

testcase.purpose: Test the ability of the user agent to handle an empty name element.

step.expected: To pass, the widget name must be an empty string..

testcase.purpose: Test that a user agent correctly processes a name element with xml:lang attribute.

step.expected: To pass, the widget name must be the string "PASS"..

testcase.purpose: Test that the user agent does not attempt to load a default start file when a custom start file has been declared.

step.expected: To pass, the widget start file must point to "pass.html" and the icons list must contain a pointer to "icon.png" at the root of the widget..

testcase.purpose: Test the UA's ability process the height attribute.

step.expected: To pass, the widget height must be either the numeric value 123 or a value greater than 0..

testcase.purpose: Test the UA's ability process the height attribute.

step.expected: To pass, the user agent must ignore the value of the height attribute (the value is composed of characters)..

testcase.purpose: Test the UA's ability process the height attribute.

step.expected: To pass, the widget height must be the numeric value 100 or a value greater than 0 (resulting from rule for parsing a non-negative integer)..

testcase.purpose: Test the UA's ability process the height attribute.

step.expected: To pass, the widget height must be the numeric value 123 or a value greater than 0 (resulting from rule for parsing a non-negative integer)..

testcase.purpose: Test the UA's ability process the height attribute.

step.expected: To pass, the widget height must be ignored (the value is an empty string, hence it would be ignored)..

testcase.purpose: Test the UA's ability process the height attribute.

step.expected: To pass, the widget height must be ignored (the value is a sequence of space characters, hence it would be ignored)..

testcase.purpose: Test the UA's ability process the height attribute.

step.expected: To pass, the widget height must be ignored (the value is an empty string)..

testcase.purpose: Test that the UA skips preference elements without a name attribute.

step.expected: To pass, widget preferences must remain an empty list (i.e., the preference is skipped)..

testcase.purpose: Test that the UA skips preference element already defined.

step.expected: To pass, widget preference must contain one preference whose name is "PASS" and whose value is "PASS" and whose readonly attr value must be "false"..

testcase.purpose: Test that the UA does a case sensitive comparison on the value of the readonly attribute.

step.expected: To pass, widget preference must contain one preference whose name is "PASS" and whose value is "PASS" and whose readonly attr value must be "false"..

testcase.purpose: Test that the UA does a case sensitive comparison on the value of the readonly attribute.

step.expected: To pass, widget preference must contain one preference whose name is "PASS" and whose value is "PASS" and whose readonly attr value must be "true"..

testcase.purpose: Test that the UA sets the readonly attribute to false by default.

step.expected: To pass, widget preference must contain one preference whose name is "PASS" and whose value is "PASS" and whose readonly attr value must be "false"..

testcase.purpose: Test that the UA skips multiple preference element already defined.

step.expected: To pass, widget preference must contain one preference whose name is "a" and whose value is "a" and whose readonly attr value must be "false"..

testcase.purpose: Test the UA's ability store preferences whose name vary only in case.

step.expected: To pass, widget preference must contain two preferences: 1 must have a name "a" and whose value is "a" and whose readonly attr value must be "false". 2 must have a name "A" and whose value is "b" and whose readonly attribute value must be "false"..

testcase.purpose: Tests that the UA applies the rule for getting a single attribute value to name, value, and readonly attributes.

step.expected: To pass, widget preference must contain one preference whose name is "PASS" and whose value is "PASS" and whose readonly attr value must be "false"..

testcase.purpose: Test to make sure that the UA only checks the root of the widget for config files, and not in an arbitrary folder.

step.expected: To pass, the user agent must treat this widget as an invalid widget (config file is not at the root)..

testcase.purpose: Test to make sure that the UA only checks the root of the widget for config files, and not in a locale folder.

step.expected: To pass, the user agent must treat this widget as an invalid widget (config file is not at the root, but in locale folder)..
